panels.description: Number of distinct commits modifying files with a given extension during the last month

targets.rawSql:
select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct ecf.sha) as "value",
  ecf.ext as "name"
from
  gha_events_commits_files ecf,
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.id = ecf.event_id
  and e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and ecf.ext not like '%/%'
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  ecf.ext
order by
  "value" desc
limit 50

panels.title: Top commits files extensions

list.definition: select distinct repo_group from gha_repos where repo_group is not null order by 1
list.label: Repository  groups
list.name: repogroups
list.query: select distinct repo_group from gha_repos where repo_group is not null order by 1

list.definition: select sub.actor from (select e.dup_actor_login as actor, count(distinct e.id) as cnt from gha_events e, gha_repos r where $__timeFilter(e.created_at) and e.repo_id = r.id and e.dup_repo_name = r.name and r.repo_group in ($repogroups) and lower(dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%']) group by e.dup_actor_login order by cnt desc limit 200) sub
list.label: Contributors
list.name: contributors
list.query: select sub.actor from (select e.dup_actor_login as actor, count(distinct e.id) as cnt from gha_events e, gha_repos r where $__timeFilter(e.created_at) and e.repo_id = r.id and e.dup_repo_name = r.name and r.repo_group in ($repogroups) and lower(dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%']) group by e.dup_actor_login order by cnt desc limit 200) sub
